mapper.select: SELECT ProductName FROM Hishop_Products WHERE ProductId IN ( SELECT ProductId FROM Hishop_OrderItems WHERE OrderId IN (SELECT top(10) OrderId FROM Hishop_Orders WHERE OrderStatus=2 AND UserId=#{userId} ORDER BY PayDate DESC) )
